title: Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard, 61 Keys Compact Mechanical Keyboard w/White and Grey Color Keycaps, Linear Red Switch, Pro Driver/Software Supported
descriptions:
Introducing the Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard, the ultimate keyboard for FPS Gamers!

Featuring a compact layout with only 61 keys, this mechanical keyboard saves space on your desk while still offering a full gaming experience. The sleek white and grey color keycaps add a touch of sophistication to your gaming setup.

The Linear Red switches provide a smooth and responsive typing experience, perfect for quick and precise movements during intense gaming sessions. With a lifespan of 50 million keypresses, this keyboard is built to last.

But that's not all! The RGB lighting system offers 20 preset modes, allowing you to customize the keyboard's appearance to match your style. Adjust the brightness and speed to create the perfect ambiance for your gaming sessions.

With the pro driver/software support, you have full control over every aspect of your keyboard. Customize the lighting effects, create macros, and assign keybindings and shortcuts to enhance your gaming performance. The software is available for download on our website for easy installation.

Designed with FPS Gamers in mind, the Redragon K617 Fizz also features optimized mouse space, ensuring you have enough room for precise mouse movements. Say goodbye to clutter and hello to efficient workspace management.
